string.name: register_yourself
string.u: Don\'t have an account? Sign up now

resources.string: Enter your registerd email and Mobile number below:
Note: If you are trying to change Password more than once in a day. Kindly use the same OTP send earlier.
Your previous orders are listed below:
You do not have any Favorite restaurants

string.name: q1
string.b: 1. Can I order from multiple restaurants?

resources.string: Ans: No you can only order from one restaurant, and one item at a time.

string.name: q2
string.b: 2. Will the food come to my door step?

resources.string: Ans: No, as it\'s just a concept app. Your ordered food will not come to your doorstep.

string.name: q3
string.b: 3. Is my data safe, which I used to register myself?

resources.string: Ans: Your data is securely saved in Internshala hosted server. Rest I don\'t know ¯\\_(ツ)_/¯ !

string.name: q4
string.b: 4. If the app crashes at some point, what should I do?

resources.string:
Ans: Try the below steps:- 

 a. Clear the app data from system settings, and run the app again. 
 
 b. Force stop the application and clear it from the memory(Recent screen), than run again. 
 
 c. If above solutions does not work, keep a note of the thing you are doing which is causing the crash, and then contact the developer.

Ans: This problem mainly occurs, when the app is unable to communicate with the server. 
 
To resolve this issue, try the below steps:- 

 a. Check your internet connection is not broken. 

 b. Restart the app, and check again. 

 c. Server is down, come back later!
You haven\'t placed any orders yet
